long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
TimeToCoda is more than just an extension! 
TimeToCoda is a complete productivity system that goes beyond time/cost basis to uncover more insights to help answer big questions every peak performer should ask:

* What I’m good at?
* What I can improve on? 
* What should be delegated or outsourced?
* What tasks feel like hard work vs those when I'm in flow?

To get started, you'll also require the TimeToCoda Doc.  Copy Doc from here:
https://coda.io/@thedayninja/timetocoda


** Why I built TimeToCoda **

I love Coda.  Like you, I love to do everything in Coda!  Yet, sometimes that can present a problem:

* Switching between Coda documents back to the time tracker doc I can lose my place;  
* Tasks I do outside of Coda - I’d like recorded in my time tracker table without opening Coda.

To solve this I designed TimeToCoda a Google Chrome extension which enables you to access your ‘To-do list’, ‘Projects’ and record the time from the convenience of Chrome whether you are in another Coda doc or some other activity.

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
"Time is more valuable than money. 
You can get more money but you can’t get more time" 

- Jim Rohan
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

 
More than just time tracking.  Win back time.  Gain insight in your TimeToCoda Dashboard.
